title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 76 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 76 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的诗歌，交与伶长，用丝弦的乐器）在犹大神为人所认识。在以色列他的名为大。

lineList.en: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
lineList.cn: 在撒冷有他的帐幕，在锡安有他的居所。

lineList.en: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.
lineList.cn: 他在那里折断弓上的火箭，并盾牌，刀剑，和争战的兵器。（细拉）

lineList.en: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.
lineList.cn: 你从有野食之山而来，有光华和荣美。

lineList.en: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.
lineList.cn: 心中勇敢的人，都被抢夺。他们睡了长觉。没有一个英雄能措手。

lineList.en: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.
lineList.cn: 雅各的神阿，你的斥责一发坐车的，骑马的，都沉睡了。

lineList.en: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
lineList.cn: 惟独你是可畏的。你怒气一发，谁能在你面前删得住呢。

lineList.en: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.
lineList.cn: 神起来施行审判，要救地上一切谦卑的人。那时地就惧怕而静默。（细拉）

lineList.en: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
lineList.cn: 人的忿怒，要成全你的荣美。人的馀怒，你要禁止。

lineList.en: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.
lineList.cn: 你们许愿，当向耶和华你们的神还愿。在他四面的人，都当拿贡物献给那可畏的主。

lineList.en: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
lineList.cn: 他要挫折王子的骄气。他向地上的君王，显威可畏。
